247    /**
248     *  <ul>
249     *   <li>list of States of the same <code>type</code> that the current State can be transitioned to. For example, when the current State is the <em>Initial</em> State of StateType <code>OrderState</code> and this list contains the reference to the <em>Shipped</em> <code>OrderState</code>, the transition <em>Initial</em> -&gt; <em>Shipped</em> is allowed.</li>
250     *   <li>if empty, no transitions are allowed from the current State, defining the current State as final for this workflow.</li>
251     *   <li>if not set, the validation is turned off and the current State can be transitioned to any other State of the same <code>type</code> as the current State.</li>
252     *  </ul>
253     */

385    public State build() {
386        Objects.requireNonNull(id, State.class + ": id is missing");
387        Objects.requireNonNull(version, State.class + ": version is missing");
388        Objects.requireNonNull(createdAt, State.class + ": createdAt is missing");
389        Objects.requireNonNull(lastModifiedAt, State.class + ": lastModifiedAt is missing");
390        Objects.requireNonNull(key, State.class + ": key is missing");
391        Objects.requireNonNull(type, State.class + ": type is missing");
392        Objects.requireNonNull(initial, State.class + ": initial is missing");
393        Objects.requireNonNull(builtIn, State.class + ": builtIn is missing");
394        return new StateImpl(id, version, createdAt, lastModifiedAt, lastModifiedBy, createdBy, key, type, name,
395            description, initial, builtIn, roles, transitions);
396    }
397
398    /**
399     * builds State without checking for non null required values
400     */
401    public State buildUnchecked() {
402        return new StateImpl(id, version, createdAt, lastModifiedAt, lastModifiedBy, createdBy, key, type, name,
403            description, initial, builtIn, roles, transitions);
404    }

406    public static StateBuilder of() {
407        return new StateBuilder();
408    }
409
410    public static StateBuilder of(final State template) {
411        StateBuilder builder = new StateBuilder();
412        builder.id = template.getId();
413        builder.version = template.getVersion();
414        builder.createdAt = template.getCreatedAt();
415        builder.lastModifiedAt = template.getLastModifiedAt();
416        builder.lastModifiedBy = template.getLastModifiedBy();
417        builder.createdBy = template.getCreatedBy();
418        builder.key = template.getKey();
419        builder.type = template.getType();
420        builder.name = template.getName();
421        builder.description = template.getDescription();
422        builder.initial = template.getInitial();
423        builder.builtIn = template.getBuiltIn();
424        builder.roles = template.getRoles();
425        builder.transitions = template.getTransitions();
426        return builder;
427    }
